page.title: 11CRUISING CLUB.
page.content: During the winter months cruising is limited therefore an opportunity arises for navigation talks.A popular course is"THE YACHTMASTERS COURSE".Near CHRISTMAS there is a frostbite series.The "REDWING " trophy is awarded to the boat that cruises furthest from TROON.There is also an ocean youth club for ages 13/14.They live on a ship 71 feet long with a professional skipper, 2 mates and 12 young people.The normal clothing is oilskins,a life/jacket and harness in either yellow or red.Safety equipment must include rockets and flares life/jacket and flotation gear.Every member must be skilled in "MAN OVERBOARD DRILL!"also everyone must be able to sail a boat in case of an emergency arising on board the ship.A most enjoyable sport.
